pages.title: 关于
pages.text: 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677787980{ "name": "张晨曦", "age": 24, "profession": "Java Developer", "experience": "2年", "address": "四川省成都市", "education": "本科", "github": "https://github.com/SombreKnight", "blog": "https://sombreknight.github.io", "email": "dlmu_zhangchenxi@foxmail.com", "description": "五年开发经验的两年Java工程师", "skills": { "Java": [ "Basic Java", "Java Collection", "Java IO", "Java Concurrent", "JVM & GC" ], "Web FrameWork": [ "Spring", "SpringMVC", "SpringBoot" ], "SpringCloud": [ "Eureka", "Ribbon", "Open Feign", "Hystrix", "GateWay" ], "SpringCloudAlibaba": [ "Nacos", "Sentinel", "Dubbo", "Seata" ], "Web Security": [ "XSS", "CSRF", "SQL injection", "Upload vulnerability", "Download vulnerability", "Url Jump vulnerability" ], "MiddleWare": [ "Redis", "Zookeeper", "RabbitMQ", "Kafka" ], "Software Engineering": [ "Design Parttern", "Code Clean Way", "Refactor", "DDD" ], "Linux": [ "basic cmd", "shell", "basic ops skills" ], "BigData": [ "Hadoop", "Spark", "Flink" ], "Others": [ "SVN", "GIT", "Maven", "Docker", "ELK", "Python", "Php", "JavaScript", "VUE" ] }}

posts.title: Sleuth && Zipkin 全链路监控
posts.text: 下载Zipkin 的jar包1http://dl.bintray.com/openzipkin/maven/io/zipkin/java/zipkin-server/2.12.9/zipkin-server-2.12.9-exec.jar 启动jar包1java -jar zipkin-server-2.12.9-exec.jar #默认端口：9411 代码 依赖12345678910<!-- 引入sleuth + zipkin --><dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.cloud</groupId> <artifactId>spring-cloud-starter-sleuth</artifactId></dependency><dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.cloud</groupId> <artifactId>spring-cloud-starter-zipkin</artifactId></dependency>

posts.title: Spring Cloud Alibaba Sentinel使用
posts.text: 官方网站 https://github.com/alibaba/Sentinel 下载sentinel-dashboard Releases · alibaba/Sentinel · GitHub 启动sentinel-dashboard1java -jar sentinel-dashboard-1.7.1.jar --server.port=9000 # 默认端口为8080 代码配置12345678910<!-- SpringCloud Alibaba Sentinel 哨兵--><dependency> <groupId>com.alibaba.cloud</groupId> <artifactId>spring-cloud-starter-alibaba-sentinel</artifactId></dependency><!-- 将Sentinel规则持久化到nacos需要依赖这个--><dependency> <groupId>com.alibaba.csp</groupId> <artifactId>sentinel-datasource-nacos</artifactId></dependency> 12345spring: cloud: sentinel: transport: dashboard: localhost:9000 # sentinel dashboard地址 访问sentinel dashboard12curl localhost:9000/# 账户密码：sentinel

posts.title: Nacos单机部署
posts.text: Nacos中文官网https://nacos.io/zh-cn/ 配置MySQL SQL文件 ： nacos/conf/nacos-mysql.sql 创建数据库nacos,执行SQL文件 修改配置文件：nacos/conf/application.properties 修改配置如下所示： 12345spring.datasource.platform=mysqldb.num=1db.url.0=jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/nacos?characterEncoding=utf8&connectTimeout=1000&socketTimeout=3000&autoReconnect=truedb.user=账号db.password=密码 启动Nacos1sh startup.sh -m standalone
